channel.title: How to make a npc say somthing?
channel.description:
sorry if der are loads none helped i want to make Hans say "Welcome to ForgeScape shops are to the south!"
and where abouts in the NPChandler.java because i cant find. =/
Thanks!

item.title: How to make a npc say somthing?
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“someone2, post:8, topic:387162”][quote author=amy_webb link=topic=482963.msg3537043#msg3537043 date=1300624014]
If it’s Delta i think you use that code if it’s Pi try this?

                }
                if (npcs[i].npcType == 793) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "Enchanted Minigame!";
               }

Just change names and ids.

And its goes in NPCHandler.java
[/quote]
Facedesk That’s exactly the same code as what I gave him as example.[/quote]
It looked different in notepad. -.- /facepalm

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a npc say somthing?
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

[quote=“ryankelty, post:6, topic:387162”][quote]if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Yar text here”;
}[/quote]

were do i place in NPChandler.java?[/quote]
I guess you’re new to making RSPS’s?
Well, just open your npchandler.java and search (ctrl + f) for something like this:

I’m sure your source already has some code for npc’s to say something, so you’ll find a piece of code that looks like the code I gave as example in my previous post.
Just copy that code you see and paste it under another npc talk thingy, and it’ll work. Then compile and restart server.

Read full topic

item.title: How to make a npc say somthing?
item.dc:creator: @someone2 someone2
item.description:
@someone2 wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:4, topic:387162”][quote author=ryankelty link=topic=482963.msg3537027#msg3537027 date=1300623147]
sorry its a 317
[/quote]
No i mean Pi, Delta ect.[/quote]
Facepalm It doesn’t matter what kind of 317 server it is.

@topic

It’s a code that looks a bit like this:

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Yar text here"; }
